Application Name: Museum of Danish National History.
Number of Reviews: 5.00.
Application Description: Welcome to the Visual Guide to the Museum of Danish National History, Frederiksborg Castle. This app will be your guide to the paintings from the 20th and 21st centuries. The app provides you with easy access to the stories behind the paintings and the era they represent. You can also use the app as an overview of all the paintings in each room. Save your own favorite paintings in the app and retrieve them after your visit.Read moreCollapse.
